content: I'm planning to buy some new clothes for an upcoming event, and I was wondering if you could give me some tips on how to style a pair of distressed denim jeans. By the way, I just redeemed a $20 gift card from Trendy Wear, which I earned from my purchases over the past few weeks - I've been back to the store twice since my first visit, and it's become one of my go-to places for trendy pieces.
